text: But the Day of the Lord will come like a thief. The heavens will disappear with a roar, the elements will be destroyed 3:10 Or dissolved; also in verses 11 and 12. by fire, and the earth and its works will be laid bare.3:10 Or will not be found. BYZ and TR will be burned up; SBL, NE, and WH will be found, i.e., will be unable to hide.
